arts.ttl: Eddie Howe Manchester City press conference with key messages ahead of Saturday’s match
arts.sum: The Eddie Howe Manchester City Press Conference has taken place. The Newcastle United Head Coach speaking to the media ahead of Saturday’s game. United facing Manchester City at 5.30pm tomorrow... You can click here to read the full article. Source

arts.ttl: Tonali and Joelinton available for Newcastle's clash with Man City, Gordon a doubt
arts.sum:
Starting with Anthony Gordon, the boss reveals he is “very close” but remains “touch and go” for Saturday,  with a “very late decision” set to be made on his availability.

Nick Pope, Sandro Tonali and Joelinton are all OK and set to be available.

arts.ttl: Newcastle v Manchester City Live TV and global channel listings on Saturday
arts.sum: Around the world, here are the channels you can watch Newcastle v Manchester City Live TV. The global TV listings are featured below for local (to you) coverage on Saturday... You can click here to read the full article. Source

arts.ttl: Man City offer James Trafford in swap deal for Newcastle star
arts.sum: Manchester City are reportedly offering goalkeeper James Trafford to Newcastle United in a bid to try to sign Tino Livramento. The Sky Blues signed Trafford from Burnley this summer, but quickly afterwards also brought in another top class goalkeeper in the form of Gianluigi Donnarumma, who is now clearly Pep Guardiola’s number one. This will […] The post Man City offer James Trafford in swap deal for Newcastle star appeared first on CaughtOffside.
Sports Mole takes a look at Manchester City striker Erling Haaland's record against Newcastle United, including overall wins, goals and assists.

arts.ttl: How Man City can silence Newcastle “superstar in the making” as expert makes Premier League prediction
arts.sum: Manchester City will find a way to keep Newcastle’s “superstar in the making” quiet in Saturday’s Premier League contest at St James’ Park, Citizens expert Steven McInerney tells Sports Mole.
